name: Custom Orders - Request Custom Orders Here
description:
**VERY IMPORTANT** Custom Orders will now be dyed ONCE A MONTH on a specified Dye Day. When you place your custom order, I will contact you ASAP about when you can expect your order to be shipped (usually one week after that month's dye day). The next Dye Day is January 18. Stimpylab loves custom orders! If you would like to start a large project with one of the Stimpylab colorways, or have an idea for a new, one of a kind color, or if there is a color that's all sold out in your favorite base, never fear! To initiate a custom order, select your base yarn from the drop down menu and enter the quantity you would like. In the notes to seller section, describe which color you are interested in and I will email you back to get the process started. A reminder about Stimpylabs colorways - every batch is truly unique, so while I can do my best to replicate most past colorways, it will never be an exact match. Also please note all sales are final for Custom Orders. Browse past colorways here! A little bit about the available base yarns...
  • Lace
    80% Extrafine Merino Wool
    20% Silk
    Lace Weight
    100g = approx 875 yds
  • Strong Sock
    80% Superwash Merino
    20% Nylon
    Fingering Weight
    100g = approx 400 yds
  • BFL Sock
    100% Superwash Bluefaced Leicester
    Fingering Weight
    100g = approx 438 yds
  • Deluxe Sock
    80% Superwash Merino
    10% Cashmere
    10% Nylon
    Fingering Weight
    100g = approx 435 yds
  • Warm Sock
    100% Superwash Merino
    Fingering Weight
    100g = approx 400 yds
  • Glitter Sock
    75% Superwash Merino
    20% Nylon
    5% Gold Tinted Stellina (Soft, not itchy)
    Fingering Weight
    100g=approx 435 yds
  • Coming Soon: Single Sock
    100% Superwash Merino
    Fingering Weight
    100g=approx 400 yds
  • Warm DK
    100% Superwash Merino
    DK Weight
    100g = approx 231 yds
  • Dreamy DK
    40% Baby Alpaca
    20% Silk
    40% Merino Wool
    DK Weight
    100g = approx 250 yds
  • BFL Aran
    100% Superwash Bluefaced Leicester
    Aran Weight
    100g = approx 180 yds
    For more on the available base yarns, check out this page!

name: Sock Yarn Club - 1 Month - January
description:
Stimpylab Select: A sock yarn club, from Stimpylab! Whats Included: - Your choice of base yarn:
  • Strong Sock
    80% Superwash Merino
    20% Nylon
    Fingering Weight
    100g = approx 400 yds
  • BFL Sock
    100% Superwash Bluefaced Leicester
    Fingering Weight
    100g = approx 438 yds
  • Deluxe Sock
    80% Superwash Merino
    10% Cashmere
    10% Nylon
    Fingering Weight
    100g = approx 435 yds
  • Warm Sock
    100% Superwash Merino
    Fingering Weight
    100g = approx 400 yds
  • Warm DK
    100% Superwash Merino
    DK Weight
    100g = approx 231 yds
  • Dreamy DK
    40% Baby Alpaca
    20% Silk
    40% Merino Wool
    DK Weight
    100g = approx 250 yds
  • Glitter Sock
    75% Superwash Merino
    20% Nylon
    5% Gold Tinted Stellina (Soft - not itchy)
    Fingering Weight
    100g=approx 435 yds
  • BFL Aran
    100% Superwash Bluefaced Leicester
    Aran Weight
    100g = approx 180 yds
- This listing is for a 1 month membership, so one skein of yarn. - The club colorways will be brand new & *exclusive* - not available to the public for at least 6 months after the shipment. - The skeins will be dyed using a similar technique to those shown in the photos (those are samples of my past work, and NOT the colors that will be part of the club). - This is a no frills club, just yummy sock yarn. Shipping: - Shipping will be paid when the membership is purchased. - Shipments will go out the second week of the month.

name: Talking Cactus - Hand Dyed Yarn
description:
Colorway is called "Talking Cactus"

Colors include shades of bright grass green, lime green, lemon yellow and natural yarn. This has been dyed by layering lots of small specks of different colors. Please note - every skein is truly unique, even within a dye lot - if working on a large project, please alternate skeins every few rows.

Choose your base!

*Strong Sock - 80% Superwash Merino 20% Nylon / Fingering Weight / 100g = approx 400 yds 
*BFL Sock - 100% Superwash Bluefaced Leicester / Fingering Weight /100g = approx 438 yds 
*Lace / 80% Extrafine Merino Wool / 20% Silk / Lace Weight / 100g = approx 875 yds

Colors include shades of royal purple, slime green, flecks of rosy plum, sage green and natural yarn. This has been dyed by layering lots of small specks of different colors. Please note - every skein is truly unique, even within a dye lot - if working on a large project, please alternate skeins every few rows.

* Dreamy DK - 40% Baby Alpaca, 20% Silk, 40% Merino Wool / DK Weight / 100g = approx 250 yds
new *BFL Aran - 100% Superwash Bluefaced Leicester/ Aran Weight/ 100g = approx 180 yds
new *Glitter Sock - 75% Superwash Merino 20% Nylon 5% Gold Tinted Stellina / 100g=approx 435 yds
